Pages

Common markup to produce Hx/UI page layouts.

Standard Layout

This UI doc is using this layout.



<div class="hx-page">
  <header class="hx-page-header"> </header>
  <main class="hx-page-body"></main>
  <footer class="hx-page-footer"></footer>
</div>
